summary: Device tree overlay configuration for PiScreen 3.5" LCD touchscreen on Raspberry Pi.
notes: Device tree filter bcm2837-rpi-3*. Overlays: piscreen-overlay with DTS for ILI9486 SPI display, GPIOs for reset/dc/led, touchscreen ADS7846, init commands for display setup, rotate 270, bgr, 30fps, 8bit bus, 16bit reg. vc4-kms-v3d-overlay for graphics acceleration, enabling CMA, i2c2, disabling fb, enabling pixelvalves, hvs, hdmi, v3d, vc4, clocks claims, vec dormant, txp, hdmi dormant dma, audio disable hdmi. Overrides for speed, rotate, fps, debug, xohms, drm, invx/y, swapxy.
reasoning: Enables hardware support for specific ILI9486 LCD with touchscreen, integrating SPI, GPIO, and graphics acceleration. Crucial for display functionality on Pi-based machines like display-0, allowing custom LCD interfaces with proper device tree modifications.
